properties.name: Feature: Advantage and disadvantage effects with automatic removal
properties.author: Kelrugem

announcement.text: Generic Advantage/Disadvantage, date 9 January 2022, for CoreRPG. Copyright 2022 Smiteworks. By Kelrugem.\rApply the effects keladvantage and keldisadvantage to apply advantage and disadvantage, respectively, to rolls.
